info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 2:54PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Broadwater, south central Meagher and north central Gallatin Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 253 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Toston, or 13 miles southeast of Townsend, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Broadwater, south central Meagher and north central Gallatin Counties. This includes Highway 12 between mile markers 11 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
